item.title: Jetski Account Recovery
item.description: In this post we will use the bdk-cli tool to recover a Jetski 2/3 multi-sig account. This would be useful in the unlikely event of downtime at Stackmate. recover your seed’s extended master key and derive child account keys create a PSBT to unlock your unspent bitcoin sign and finalize the resulting PSBTs broadcast and confirm spending transactions via Blockstream

item.title: Solo Account Recovery
item.description: This tutorial is a stripped down version of Steve Myers and Thundabirds article from bdk-cli In this post we will use the bdk-cli tool to recover accounts from a bitcoin seed. recover your seed’s extended master key and derive child account keys create a PSBT to unlock your unspent bitcoin sign and finalize the resulting PSBTs broadcast and confirm spending transactions via Blockstream Note: We use testnet in the examples for you to try.

item.title: Roots
item.description: Origins A bitcoin hodler, a bitcoin miner and a bitcoin developer met. Vision A sound monetary base. Process Work with the larger bitcoin-core community to develop bitcoin infrastructure and build relavant products that improve UX while preserving bitcoin-core fundamentals.
